"javascript link":javascript:alert('scary stuff')

notextile. <script>alert('scary js is running1')</script>

###. the == notation below is same as notextile. above

==<script>alert('scary js is running2')</script>==

<script type="text/javascript">alert("All your base are belong to us");</script>

<a href="javascript:alert('scary')">jslink</a>
